attributes.action: change the legislation for benefits for under 25 year olds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I purpose that the government changes the legislation for benefits for under 25’s. 
At the moment under 25’s are restricted to the amount of benefits they get, for the reason of their age only.
If you are under 25 years old you can only claim a Shared Room Rate for Housing Benefit, regardless of your housing situation.
You are also only allowed a certain amount from the Job Centre Plus, and you have to be over 25 years old to claim Income Support.

But if you are under 25 years old you are expected to work, pay taxes, be a good citizen and fight for your country.   
 Also you are allowed to drink, smoke, have a bank account, credit cards, and buy property, rent property and drive.
Which is exactly the same for over 25’s but you are not entitled to the same benefits as over 25’s.
